fields.fieldTitle: 1) Whether the borrower has submitted the Quarterly Statement (a. GST return, b. Stock Statement) - for the last quarter
2a) Whether verification/inspection of stock (as mentioned in the stock & book debt statement) and has been carried out on sample basis

2b) Any substantial variation is observed by visiting officer. 
 (if Yes, BO may advise borrower to furnish explanation for the same and monitor the OD account closely)
2c) Whether credit summation is matching with sales of the quarter.  If not, please comment on the same.
2d) Whether GST returns are matching with sales of the quarter.  If not, please comment on the same
3) Whether the stock register is properly maintained by the unit
4) Whether stocks, as appearing in stock register on the date of visit, were checked on random sample basis (ABC analysis) and found in order
5) Long outstanding book debts & problem in realization thereof
6) Any difficulty experienced in carrying out the inspection

segments.segmentTitle: Comments of visiting officer (on each property separately)

fields.fieldTitle: 1) Whether there exists an approach road to the property
2) Whether the property can be reached by the address given in the documents, if not a location map is required to be attached
3) Whether the property is clearly identifiable along with boundaries thereof
4) Whether are and boundaries of the property to be mortgaged/mortgaged tally with the documents of title

5) Nature of property whether vacant or build, if in possession, whether the owner is in possession or tenant is in possession. If tenant is in possession, the nature and period of tenancy and whether the same has been accepted by the Branch at the time of title acceptance. (Details of tenancy if any post mortgage may also be reported or captured)
6) Whether independent enquiries from the neighbours/local persons regarding title/possession of the property and made and outcome may be mentioned
7) Comments on discreet enquiry about market value of the property
Address(Whether the address at the time of inspection is matching with the address given in the pool)
Name of NBFC official with whom discussion were held during the visit
